design_system.name: SYNDICA FORGE Design System
design_system.description: A hyper-professional, secure, and dense interface designed for high-volume video production and distribution. It combines the utility of a Bloomberg terminal with the sleekness of a cyber-security dashboard.

steps: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install @fontsource/azeret-mono @fontsource/manrope @fontsource/jetbrains-mono lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge`
2. Update `tailwind.config.js` with the color palette and font families defined above.
3. Create a `Layout` component that enforces the 'Control Room' grid structure.
4. Customize Shadcn components in `components/ui` to remove rounded-xl and replace with rounded-sm, and update border colors.
5. Implement the `Sidebar` with a 'glassmorphism' effect and 'tech_borders' on active items.
universal_rules: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds unless specified (use solid deep blacks).
DO NOT use rounded corners larger than 8px (sm or md only).
ALWAYS use `Azeret Mono` for headings to maintain the 'Terminal' aesthetic.
Ensure all text has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 against the background.
